id.description: Unique identifier of the given object.
id.title: Id

value.description: Topic or Subject term that is relevant to this Dataset.
value.title: Value

vocab.description: Provided for specification of the controlled vocabulary in use, e.g., LCSH, MeSH, etc.
vocab.title: Vocab

vocab_uri.description: Specifies the URI location for the full controlled vocabulary.
vocab_uri.title: Vocab Uri
